mapper.sql: id, equ_num, equ_type, lat, lng, hight, active, electricity, create_time
mapper.insert: insert into locationinfo (equ_num, equ_type, lat, lng, hight, active, electricity, create_time) values (#{equNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lat,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{lng,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{hight,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{active,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{electricity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

equ_num,
equ_type,
lat,
lng,

electricity,
create_time,

mapper.update:
update locationinfo
equ_num = #{equNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
equ_type = #{equType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lat = #{lat,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
lng = #{lng,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
hight = #{hight,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
active = #{active,jdbcType=INTEGER},
electricity = #{electricity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
